#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define f first
#define s second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define pp pair<int,int>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define ll long long int

using namespace std ;

int main()
{
   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   
   int test ;
   
   cin >> test ;
   
   int N ;
   
   while(test--)
   {
       cin >> N ;
       
       int freq[101] = {0} ;
       
       int a[N] ;
       
       for(int i = 0 ; i < N ; i++)
        {
            cin >> a[i] ;
            
            freq[a[i]]++ ;
        }
        
        for(int i = 1 ; i <= 100 ; i++)
          {
              if(freq[i] == 1)
               {
                   cout << i << endl ;
                   break ;
               }
          }
   }
   
   return 0 ;
}
